fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Interface KernelSVM<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Classifier<T>, java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoubleQNPKL, GradMKL, LaSVM, LaSVMI, SDCA, SimpleMKL, SMOSVM, TSMKL

    public interface KernelSVM<T>
extends Classifier<T>
    Interface for SVM algorithms using a non-linear kernel (dual optimization mainly)
    Author:
    picard
